content.body: For a Pattern ({ a: b }), is Assignment ( pattern = expr ) and ForIn/ForOf ( for (pattern of) ) the only case that can change "b" instead of declare a new "b"?
they do appear to be the only two places that reference AssignmentPattern in the spec, other references are for early errors
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: they do appear to be the only two places that reference AssignmentPattern in the spec, other references are for early errors
